verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord of all we now give You all glory and praise And we ask You to soften our hardness We see how You have emptied Yourself And we fall on our knees and give thanks.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You have won the vict’ry How can we but rejoice Your steadfast love is greater than all of our strife Thank you, God, for not giving up Thank you, Lord, for filling my cup I take up my cross knowing You are the key to life.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Father God, we confess that we’re shallow And we are unable to add to Your kingdom But with God we can break from our grave And rest in His merciful peace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Christ, I now give You my life and my heart Thinking only of all of Your mercies Holy God, I want to be changed And filled up with Your perfect life.{/lang-eng}
